title: Accounting Practice Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Whiteboard Voiceover

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting terminology and understanding of financial statement structures
context.additional_context: Instructional competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Learners in administrative/leadership roles engage in a mobile-accessible microlearning environment, visualizing accounting concepts through WBVO videos, and participating in real-time discussions.

learning_goals: Learners can explain accounting journal entry processes with 80% accuracy through WBVO videos
Learners can apply cost calculation case studies to create budget planning reports in project-based assessments
Learners can correct financial analysis errors at least twice through peer evaluation and feedback in a flipped learning environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
